overview: Ambedkar, a social activist, gets involved in the dark side of the government. As a result, his son and friends are killed. A lower caste individual desires to marry a girl from a higher caste. A woman leaves for Chennai to marry the man of her choice. A man is in need of Rs 20,000 to save his son's life. How these separate stories interact forms the rest of the story.
title: Ettu Thikkum Para
